scripts.dev: npm run build && concurrently "npx @tailwindcss/cli -i src/styles.css -o dist/styles.css --watch" "serve dist -l 3000"
scripts.build: npx @tailwindcss/cli -i src/styles.css -o dist/styles.css --minify && cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp src/privacy.html dist/privacy.html && rm -rf dist/assets && mkdir -p dist/assets && cp ../../assets/icon*.png ../../assets/icon.ico ../../assets/icon-rounded.png dist/assets/ && cp -r assets/screenshots dist/assets/screenshots && cp assets/toss_qr.png dist/assets/toss_qr.png
